title: Ep - 172 - MADISON LECROY FROM SOUTHERN CHARM
description:
Madison Lecroy appears on this season of Southern Charm. She talks about her life before joining the show, her relationship with Austen, what happened the morning of the infamous viral video, and the real reason she does not get along with Craig and Shep. 


Kara Berry and Ryan Bailey from Realizing Stuff podcast help break down the season finale of Keeping Up With the Kardashians and the love triangle between Tristan, Khloe, and Jordyn. 


Stephen McGee from Summer House reviews The Hills: New Beginnings and gives an insider account of Jax and Brittany’s wedding.


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com

Instagram: @katecaseyca
